channel.title: Exploring Eberron and Homebrew Races
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Exploring Eberron and Homebrew Races" - Thoughts potentially on adding the homebrew races from Keith Baker's Exploring Eberron or other homebrew races

item.title: Re: Exploring Eberron and Homebrew Races
item.content:encoded:
Alrighty, so these are going to be in the new Lineage format as we plan to move to that format in future for races pages I believe, so here's what Ive got so far:

http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/lineage:aasimar-court-ee
http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/lineage:aasimar-seeker-ee
http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/lineage:aasimar-fernian-variant-ee
http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/lineage:aasimar-mabaran-variant-ee

Currently just the aasimar, and ill work through the rest of the bunch in time.

Oh yeah, someone else on the wiki (or I will eventually if none want to I guess) who likes working with items could probably work on getting the items from it ported in too if we haven't already

item.title: Re: Exploring Eberron and Homebrew Races
item.content:encoded:
Id be interested in seeing them make an appearance in the homebrew section, which doesnt have yet but could hold a homebrew races section. The aasimar subraces would need their own unique homebrew-ebberon page most likely, since putting them on the regular aasimar page would probably cause confusion to newer players who might think its base game

but yeah, im in favor of adding them, might get around to creating pages if I find the moment to do so in my day

item.title: Exploring Eberron and Homebrew Races
item.content:encoded: Heyo, I was recently looking through the Exploring Eberron book, and I know that the homebrew subclasses are added onto here, but I was wondering if there would be a chance to add the homebrew races as well? Such as the Gnoll, and extra subraces for Aasimar and etc. It would be cool to see them on here, but i understand if not. Thanks for y'all time!
